DOC.brief_summary: The investigators are looking at the effects of baby shampoo nasal irrigation on the movement of mucous in the nose in patients who have undergone sinus surgery for chronic sinus problems.
DOC.brief_title: Mucociliary Clearance Time in Chronic Rhinosinusitis (CRS) Patients After Sinus Surgery
DOC.criteria: CRS s/p sinus surgery nasal polyps
